SELECT VHC_ID , VHC_NO , CHAS_NO , VHC_INFO.CORP_ID , CORP_INFO.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , AREA , MAKER , RELS_DATE , MODEL_NM , VHC_KIND , DL_CD.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , VHC_TYPE , DL_CD2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE_NM , LF_YN , DL_CD3.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN_NM , VHC_FUEL , DL_CD4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , VHC_INFO.REMARK , VHC_INFO.USE_YN FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC_INFO LEFT JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP_INFO ON VHC_INFO.CORP_ID = CORP_INFO.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD ON VHC_INFO.VHC_KIND = DL_CD.DL_CD LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD2 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_TYPE = DL_CD2.DL_CD LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD3 ON VHC_INFO.LF_YN = DL_CD3.DL_CD LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD4 ON VHC_INFO.VHC_FUEL = DL_CD4.DL_CD
VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR MODEL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY VHC_ID
